statements: UPDATE water_conservation_regulations SET enforcement_agency='Department of Environmental Protection', regulation_description='Ensuring compliance with water conservation regulations' WHERE regulation_id=1

UPDATE water_conservation_regulations SET enforcement_agency = 'Environmental Protection Agency', compliance_requirements = 'Regular Inspections' WHERE regulation_id = 1

UPDATE WaterRegulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ComplianceRecords SET compliance_status = true, last_checked = '2022-07-15 10:30:00' WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
UPDATE WaterRegulations SET regulation_description = 'New Description', compliance_deadline = '2023-01-01' WHERE regulation_name = 'Water Quality Regulation';
